alert.note: Alert for Greene; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 9:34AM CST until January 12 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM CST FOR CENTRAL GREENE AND NORTH CENTRAL SUMTER COUNTIES... At 934 AM CST, a confirmed tornado was located near Gainesville, or 11 miles north of Livingston, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Eutaw, Boligee, Union, Gainesville, Allison, Walden Quarters, Knoxville, New Mount Hebron, Sumterville, Eutaw Municipal Airport, Clinton, Five Points Intersection and I 20 Rest Area Near Eutaw. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
